verses.verse: The hand <S%H3027><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> me, and carried me out <S%H3318><s%> in the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and set me down <S%H5117><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the valley <S%H1237><s%> which <S%H1931><s%> was full <S%H4392><s%> of bones, <S%H6106><s%>

And caused me to pass <S%H5674><s%> by <S%H5921><s%> them round about: <S%H5439><s%> <S%H5439><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> there were very <S%H3966><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> the open <S%H6440><s%> valley; <S%H1237><s%> and, lo, <S%H2009><s%> they were very <S%H3966><s%> dry. <S%H3002><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> can these <S%H428><s%> bones <S%H6106><s%> live? <S%H2421><s%> And I answered, <S%H559><s%> O Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD, <S%H3069><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> knowest. <S%H3045><s%>

Again he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, Prophesy <S%H5012><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> these <S%H428><s%> bones, <S%H6106><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, O ye dry <S%H3002><s%> bones, <S%H6106><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%> unto these <S%H428><s%> bones; <S%H6106><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I <S%H589><s%> will cause breath <S%H7307><s%> to enter <S%H935><s%> into you, and ye shall live: <S%H2421><s%>

And I will lay <S%H5414><s%> sinews <S%H1517><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> you, and will bring up <S%H5927><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> you, and cover <S%H7159><s%> <S%H5921><s%> you with skin, <S%H5785><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> breath <S%H7307><s%> in you, and ye shall live; <S%H2421><s%> and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

So I prophesied <S%H5012><s%> as <S%H834><s%> I was commanded: <S%H6680><s%> and as I prophesied, <S%H5012><s%> there was <S%H1961><s%> a noise, <S%H6963><s%> and behold <S%H2009><s%> a shaking, <S%H7494><s%> and the bones <S%H6106><s%> came together, <S%H7126><s%> bone <S%H6106><s%> to <S%H413><s%> his bone. <S%H6106><s%>

And when I beheld, <S%H7200><s%> lo, <S%H2009><s%> the sinews <S%H1517><s%> and the flesh <S%H1320><s%> came up <S%H5927><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> them, and the skin <S%H5785><s%> covered <S%H7159><s%> <S%H5921><s%> them above: <S%H4605><s%> but there was no <S%H369><s%> breath <S%H7307><s%> in them.

Then said <S%H559><s%> he unto <S%H413><s%> me, Prophesy <S%H5012><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the wind, <S%H7307><s%> prophesy, <S%H5012><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the wind, <S%H7307><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Come <S%H935><s%> from the four <S%H4480><s%> <S%H702><s%> winds, <S%H7307><s%> O breath, <S%H7307><s%> and breathe <S%H5301><s%> upon these <S%H428><s%> slain, <S%H2026><s%> that they may live. <S%H2421><s%>

So I prophesied <S%H5012><s%> as <S%H834><s%> he commanded <S%H6680><s%> me, and the breath <S%H7307><s%> came <S%H935><s%> into them, and they lived, <S%H2421><s%> and stood up <S%H5975><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> their feet, <S%H7272><s%> an exceeding <S%H3966><s%> <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> army. <S%H2428><s%>

Then he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> these <S%H428><s%> bones <S%H6106><s%> are the whole <S%H3605><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> they say, <S%H559><s%> Our bones <S%H6106><s%> are dried, <S%H3001><s%> and our hope <S%H8615><s%> is lost: <S%H6><s%> we are cut off <S%H1504><s%> for our parts.

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> prophesy <S%H5012><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> O my people, <S%H5971><s%> I <S%H589><s%> will open <S%H6605><s%> <S%H853><s%> your graves, <S%H6913><s%> and cause you to come up <S%H5927><s%> out of your graves, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6913><s%> and bring <S%H935><s%> you into <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> when I have opened <S%H6605><s%> <S%H853><s%> your graves, <S%H6913><s%> O my people, <S%H5971><s%> and brought you up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H853><s%> out of your graves, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6913><s%>

And shall put <S%H5414><s%> my spirit <S%H7307><s%> in you, and ye shall live, <S%H2421><s%> and I shall place <S%H5117><s%> you in <S%H5921><s%> your own land: <S%H127><s%> then shall ye know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> have spoken <S%H1696><s%> it, and performed <S%H6213><s%> it, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
The word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> again unto <S%H413><s%> me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Moreover, thou <S%H859><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> thee one <S%H259><s%> stick, <S%H6086><s%> and write <S%H3789><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> it, For Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> his companions: <S%H2270><s%> then take <S%H3947><s%> another <S%H259><s%> stick, <S%H6086><s%> and write <S%H3789><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> it, For Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> the stick <S%H6086><s%> of Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> and for all <S%H3605><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> his companions: <S%H2270><s%>

And join <S%H7126><s%> them one <S%H259><s%> to <S%H413><s%> another <S%H259><s%> into one <S%H259><s%> stick; <S%H6086><s%> and they shall become <S%H1961><s%> one <S%H259><s%> in thine hand. <S%H3027><s%>

And when <S%H834><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of thy people <S%H5971><s%> shall speak <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thee, saying, <S%H559><s%> Wilt thou not <S%H3808><s%> show <S%H5046><s%> us what <S%H4100><s%> thou meanest by these? <S%H428><s%>

Say <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I <S%H589><s%> will take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> the stick <S%H6086><s%> of Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is in the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> and the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> his fellows, <S%H2270><s%> and will put <S%H5414><s%> them with <S%H5921><s%> him, even with <S%H854><s%> the stick <S%H6086><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and make <S%H6213><s%> them one <S%H259><s%> stick, <S%H6086><s%> and they shall be <S%H1961><s%> one <S%H259><s%> in mine hand. <S%H3027><s%>
And the sticks <S%H6086><s%> whereon <S%H834><s%> <S%H5921><s%> thou writest <S%H3789><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> in thine hand <S%H3027><s%> before their eyes. <S%H5869><s%>

And say <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I <S%H589><s%> will take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> from among <S%H4480><s%> <S%H996><s%> the heathen, <S%H1471><s%> whither <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> they be gone, <S%H1980><s%> and will gather <S%H6908><s%> them on every side, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5439><s%> and bring <S%H935><s%> them into <S%H413><s%> their own land: <S%H127><s%>

And I will make <S%H6213><s%> them one <S%H259><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> upon the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and one <S%H259><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> to them all: <S%H3605><s%> and they shall be <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> nations, <S%H1471><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall they be divided <S%H2673><s%> into two <S%H8147><s%> kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> any more at all: <S%H5750><s%> <S%H5750><s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> shall they defile <S%H2930><s%> themselves any more <S%H5750><s%> with their idols, <S%H1544><s%> nor with their detestable things, <S%H8251><s%> nor with any <S%H3605><s%> of their transgressions: <S%H6588><s%> but I will save <S%H3467><s%> them out of all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> their dwelling places, <S%H4186><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> they have sinned, <S%H2398><s%> and will cleanse <S%H2891><s%> them: so shall they be <S%H1961><s%> my people, <S%H5971><s%> and I <S%H589><s%> will be <S%H1961><s%> their God. <S%H430><s%>

And David <S%H1732><s%> my servant <S%H5650><s%> shall be king <S%H4428><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> them; and they all <S%H3605><s%> shall have <S%H1961><s%> one <S%H259><s%> shepherd: <S%H7462><s%> they shall also walk <S%H1980><s%> in my judgments, <S%H4941><s%> and observe <S%H8104><s%> my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> them.

And they shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> that <S%H834><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> unto Jacob <S%H3290><s%> my servant, <S%H5650><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> your fathers <S%H1><s%> have dwelt; <S%H3427><s%> and they shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> therein, <S%H5921><s%> even they, <S%H1992><s%> and their children, <S%H1121><s%> and their children's <S%H1121><s%> children <S%H1121><s%> forever: <S%H5769><s%> and my servant <S%H5650><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> shall be their prince <S%H5387><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%>

Moreover I will make <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> of peace <S%H7965><s%> with them; it shall be <S%H1961><s%> an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%> with <S%H854><s%> them: and I will place <S%H5414><s%> them, and multiply <S%H7235><s%> them, and will set <S%H5414><s%> my sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of them forevermore. <S%H5769><s%>

My tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> also shall be <S%H1961><s%> with <S%H5921><s%> them: yea, I will be <S%H1961><s%> their God, <S%H430><s%> and they <S%H1992><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> my people. <S%H5971><s%>

And the heathen <S%H1471><s%> shall know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> do sanctify <S%H6942><s%> <S%H853><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> when my sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of them forevermore. <S%H5769><s%>
